channel.title: I need help
channel.description: i need help making a rs server i don't know how to make the npc you made to talk or make other people play it without me having to be on if any1 can help me i would give you some money and i can help you but i don`t know how so if any1 can help i would be real happy :D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 30, 2008, 03:02:05 pm[/size][hr]bump[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 30, 2008, 03:10:34 pm[/size][hr]if u help me do the hole private server i am offering a bonus of 160$[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 30, 2008, 03:15:15 pm[/size][hr]if u tell me the clients and everything u need to make a private server plz tell me if your interested in making some money and if ur making the server with me.
